dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 8067 IH: To make technical changes clarifying section 503 of the Federal Credit Reform Act of 1990.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Yarmuth introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Budget

form.official-title: To make technical changes clarifying section 503 of the Federal Credit Reform Act of 1990.

section.header: Technical changes with respect to cost estimates
section.text: Section 503(d) of the Federal Credit Reform Act of 1990 (2 U.S.C. 661b(d)) is amended by striking the period at the end and inserting , which shall include the percent guaranteed on loan guarantee commitments..
